answers.answer: Hi Selma,it is really great that you will have some testing done.Let us know how you go and the results and hopefully we can help and reassure you.
Hi, I will, and thank you so much, its nice to have a place like this, with people who are ready to help you
Hi Selma,how did your dr appointment go?  Any news on the results yet?Sally
Hi Sallyno, unfortunately not yet, next eek maybe

Ok.  How are you feeling now?Will look forward to hearing your results.Have you tried eating something when you feel shakey?  Something like a piece of candy or some fruit juice?  Does it make a difference?

question: I'm a 15 year old girl , my problems started a while ago when I started feeling dizzy for few times a day, and it never stopsed, sometimes its so hard I need to hold on to something not to fall. in the last few weeks its even worse, my hands are shaking so much I can't even hold a pen, I can't feel my legs and I have a weird feeling in my chest and stomach, I'm taking a blood test tomorrow and I'm terrified, I'm afraid it might be serious. my english is bad, I'm sorry, its not my first language. Please help
title: 15 year old,same problems for few months,, afraid it might be diabetes
